blocks.subject: Re: So far
text: The following CPs are not authorized to trade US power:
City of Huntsville:  Not a current trading partner/not FERC approved
Cytec Industries Inc.:  Not a current trading partner/not FERC approved
Torch Energy TM, Inc:  Not a current trading partner/not FERC approved;
Ameren Services Company:  Sell pursuant to their Service Ag; Buy pursuant to
Williams Energy:  no change -- authorized to trade.
